item.title: Tricks
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 1. 数据增强 数据增强是增加深度模型鲁棒性和泛化性能的常用手段，随机翻转、随机裁剪、添加噪声等也被引入到检测任务的训练中来，个人认为数据（监督信

item.title: OpenSource
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 1. PySOT PySOT is a software system designed by SenseTime Video Intelligence Research team. It implements state-of-the-art single object tracking algorithms, including SiamRPN and SiamMask. It is written in Python and powered by the PyTorch deep learning framework. This project also contains a Python port of toolkit for evaluating trackers. The goal of PySOT is to provide a high-quality, high-performance codebase for visual tracking research. It is designed to be
